name: Hl7VSFileLevelEventCode
title: hl7VS-file-levelEventCode
description: Concepts specifying file-level events for master files.  Used in HL7 Version 2 messaging in the MFI segment.
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

contains.display: Replace current version of this master file with the version contained in this message
Change file records as defined in the record-level event codes for each record that follows
